duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensures shelf-edge integrity; checks shelf tags and makes accurate changes.
Prints signs and tags and researches inventory discrepancies and makes corrections.
Provides scan accuracy for weekly advertisement and monitors the condition of scanners and register terminals; reports any issues.
Ensures items printed in advertisement are in stock and executes resets and new item process.
Executes process for exited and discontinued items and assigns PSA to all Plan-O-Gram items.
Orders product, fixtures, and supplies for all reset work and ensures scale maintenance is performed daily.
Maintains store mapping labels to support PSA processes and executes Shelf Edge Roadmap notes to ensure accuracy on inventory for total store.
Performs the above responsibilities to ensure accurate stocking and a smooth experience for customers.

education_certification.credential: Minimum age 18 (mandatory) and 6+ months of related experience. Completion of required job skills and compliance-related training
